title.rendered: Being Part of Fiverr Workspace Just Got Sweeter with Freelance Member Benefits

content.rendered:
Today, we’re excited to launch our latest addition to AND CO: Freelance Benefits!
As a business owner, you need tools to help streamline your workflow, make your day efficient, and even to enjoy your time off after a hard day of work. With that in mind, we sought out partnerships that would provide additional benefits to our members just like we do within the app. From business cards courtesy of MOO to workflow efficiency tools like AWeber and Droplr to free time perks like Blue Apron and BarkBox, we want Fiverr Workspace members to have the best things possible. Over the next few months, we’ll be introducing all our great member perks to you on the blog–be sure to check them out!

Starting today, all the freelance benefits are accessible for free for all Fiverr Workspace members. So, head over to the benefits page with your Fiverr Workspace login and find out all the great perks you can gain access to today! Let us know what else you’d like to see!
And be sure to check out our other super helpful tools like our quarterly tax calculator, invoice generator, and the best places to find jobs online.
